column2: Having become a ruler in my own right it is time for me to decide whether I favor the government of a warrior, similar to that of [FromFrom.GetBestName], or a more bureaucratic government.
A bureaucratic government sounds rather nice...
Having become a ruler in my own right it is time for me to decide whether I favor a more priesly government, similar to that of [FromFrom.GetBestName], or a more bureaucratic government.
A bureaucratic government sounds rather nice...
Having taken over from [FromFrom.GetBestName], I need to decide whether I wish to have the government of a warrior like [FromFrom.GetHerHim] or if I would rather have a bureaucratic government.
A bureaucratic government sounds rather nice...
Having taken over from [FromFrom.GetBestName], I need to decide whether I wish to have a more priestly government like [FromFrom.GetHerHis] or if I would rather have a bureaucratic government.
A bureaucratic government sounds rather nice...
Having inherited from [FromFrom.GetBestName], I need to decide whether I wish to have the government of a warrior like [FromFrom.GetHerHim] or if I would rather have a bureaucratic government.
A bureaucratic government sounds rather nice...
